name: Dinosaurs A Prehistoric Adventure
description:
Be the Dinosaur!Experience the world of dinosaurs like never before! Dinosaurs A Prehistoric Adventure is an ARPG where you could play as 15 dinosaurs in a semi-open world environment.DescriptionDinosaurs A Prehistoric Adventure is an ARPG where you could play as 15 dinosaurs set in a fictional world. Even though the setting of this game is completely fictional, the dinosaurs included are modeled based on real world findings. Each dinosaur is unique and have their own strengths and weaknesses. This means that each dinosaur have their own way of overcoming challenges. Dinosaurs A Prehistoric Adventure includes two main modes, the adventure mode, where players would be able to play as a dinosaur, and an exhibition mode where players would get to know more about the dinosaurs.LoreThe world of Dinosaurs A Prehistoric Adventure brings players to a post-apocalyptic prehistoric world where pods have erupted and released poisonous material to the atmosphere. The rapid increase of poisonous material in the air transform some of the inhabitants into mutated violent beings that are wreaking havoc in the land. These beings are guarding the source of the corruption and should be stop at all cost before more fell victim to this contamination.Features
  • Play as 15 dinosaurs with each having their own strengths and weaknesses
  • ARPG elements combined with survival elements such as hunger, thirst, and much more
  • Rich and unique environments that are both challenging and fun to explore
  • Two game modes: Adventure Mode and Exhibition Mode
  • Simple controls
